Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20005311 TCQ, pursuant to §20-225 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Ditmars Corner, Inc., to continue to maintain and operate an enclosed sidewalk café located at 35-02 Ditmars Boulevard, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 22.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.MinutesNote: See Land Use Meeitng on 9/19/00 for vote.

Items.Title: Application no. 20005409 GFM, pursuant to §363 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning a proposed Authorizing Resolution authorizing the Department Of Transportation to grant a franchise for the provision of aerial tramway service over the East River between Manhattan and Roosevelt Island to the Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation.
Items.MinutesNote: See Land Use Meeitng on 9/19/00 for vote.
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, Aerial Tramway Service, Manhattan and Roosevelt Island, (20005409GFM)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 000151 ZMR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 51.
Items.MinutesNote: See Land Use Meeitng on 9/19/00 for vote.
